Text:
@Mirrormaster82 - THANKS, man!!!! You truly are a god among men. 

By any chance do you have the following graphic novels? 

At The Mountains of Madness (Graphic Novel) by Culbard

The Advance Team by Pfeifer 

Gone to Amerikay by McCulloch
Thanks MM. I hate to even request from you considering you give so much.....but do you have dan the unharmable #2? Thanks again!
